languages.text: "Для {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}оценки твоих действий{/d} мне нужно знать, какое назначение у того ритуала, который мы прервали своим появлением. Отвечай".
"If I am to form an {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}assessment of your actions{/d}, I must know the purpose of the ritual we interrupted when we arrived. Answer me."
languages.original_text: "Для {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}оценки твоих действий{/d} мне нужно знать, какое назначение у того ритуала, который мы прервали своим появлением. Отвечай".

traits.locale_text: "If I am to form an assessment of your actions, I must know the purpose of the ritual we interrupted when we arrived. Answer me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If I am to form an assessment of your actions, I must know the purpose of the ritual we interrupted when we arrived. Answer me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If I am to form an assessment of your actions, I must know the purpose of the ritual we interrupted when we arrived. Answer me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If I am to form an {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}assessment of your actions{/d}, I must know the purpose of the ritual we interrupted when we arrived. Answer me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如果要我{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}对你的行为进行评估{/d}，我必须了解我们打断的仪式是做什么用的。回答我的问题。”
languages.original_text: "If I am to form an {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}assessment of your actions{/d}, I must know the purpose of the ritual we interrupted when we arrived. Answer me."

traits.locale_text: “如果要我对你的行为进行评估，我必须了解我们打断的仪式是做什么用的。回答我的问题。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Para poder {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}evaluar tus acciones{/d}, necesito conocer el propósito del ritual que interrumpimos al llegar. Respóndame».
languages.original_text: "If I am to form an {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}assessment of your actions{/d}, I must know the purpose of the ritual we interrupted when we arrived. Answer me."

traits.locale_text: «Para poder evaluar tus acciones, necesito conocer el propósito del ritual que interrumpimos al llegar. Respóndame».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「もし私があなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}行動を評価{/d}したいのであれば、到着時に中断した儀式の目的を知らなければなりません。答えてください」
languages.original_text: "If I am to form an {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}assessment of your actions{/d}, I must know the purpose of the ritual we interrupted when we arrived. Answer me."

traits.locale_text: 「もし私があなたの行動を評価したいのであれば、到着時に中断した儀式の目的を知らなければなりません。答えてください」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « S'il me faut {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}évaluer vos actes{/d}, je dois connaître la finalité du rituel que nous avons interrompu à notre arrivée. Répondez. »
languages.original_text: "If I am to form an {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}assessment of your actions{/d}, I must know the purpose of the ritual we interrupted when we arrived. Answer me."

traits.locale_text: « S'il me faut évaluer vos actes, je dois connaître la finalité du rituel que nous avons interrompu à notre arrivée. Répondez. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn ich eine {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}Einschätzung Eures Handelns{/d} vornehmen soll, muss ich den Zweck des Rituals erfahren, das wir bei unserer Ankunft unterbrochen haben. Antwortet mir!"
languages.original_text: "If I am to form an {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}assessment of your actions{/d}, I must know the purpose of the ritual we interrupted when we arrived. Answer me."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich eine Einschätzung Eures Handelns vornehmen soll, muss ich den Zweck des Rituals erfahren, das wir bei unserer Ankunft unterbrochen haben. Antwortet mir!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}Eylemlerinin bir değerlendirmesini{/d} yapacaksam geldiğimizde böldüğümüz ayinin amacını öğrenmeliyim. Konuş."
languages.original_text: "If I am to form an {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}assessment of your actions{/d}, I must know the purpose of the ritual we interrupted when we arrived. Answer me."

traits.locale_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}Eylemlerinin bir değerlendirmesini{/d} yapacaksam, geldiğimizde böldüğümüz ayinin amacını öğrenmem gerek. Yanıt ver bana."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
